def.dt: :causing or tending to cause something to slide or fall slippery roads
:tending to slip from the grasp a slippery fish
:not precise or fixed in meaning :ambiguous elusive
:a large-leaved elm (Ulmus rubra syn. U. fulva) of eastern and central North America that has hard wood and fragrant mucilaginous inner bark
:a course of action that seems to lead inevitably from one action or result to another with unintended consequences
